content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: red_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "bone_block", "quantity": 38, "index": 12}, {"type": "beetroot", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "spruce_door", "quantity": 8, "index": 20}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 22, "index": 27}, {"type": "acacia_door", "quantity": 23, "index": 32}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 36}, {"type": "netherite_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 32, "index": 40}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 48, "index": 42}, {"type": "music_disc_mellohi", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft red stained glass, I need to craft red dye. Red dye requires placing 1 beetroot in the crafting table. Therefore I will move the beetroot from slot 18 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 1 with quantity 1
